aboutUs.heading: ABOUT US
aboutUs.mainText: Our company is established on May in 2017. The activity of the company is production and processing of the meat and sells of the snails. The city of Smederevo decades back has a tradition in the production and processing of edible species of snails, both from the territory of Serbia and from the territory of surrounding countries. Technology of the processing snails started to developing in the ex ago-company „ VOCAR BELGRADE“, this is a cold storage drive unit that was mainly involved in the export of delicatessen products to the market of Western European countries. That production has continually developed and perfected until nowadays. People with decades of experience in this job, again have restrained forces, and with the help of  young and educated staff has started up the new operation of processing which is intended for export on the market of the countries of European Union. Procurement of live snail is done by subcontractors which a lot of years has done with this job. These are people who are experience and trained for collecting edible snails, and a lot of them has a familiar tradition doing this job. One piece of raw materials is importing from surrounding countries ( Macedonia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Albania, Romania and Bulgaria).

production.heading: PRODUCTION
production.mainText: The production lines in the facility have been adapted to current European standards, while the warehouses are state-of-the-art fully automated refrigeration systems consisting of a cooling mode chamber, deep frozen goods storage tunnel and deep freezing tunnels. Production in our facility has production lines for blanching of snails (9.7t / day), line for heat treatment of snail meat (1t / day), line for washing and sterilizing houses (1t / day).

home.moto: Life Should Taste As Good As Snails.
home.motoDescription: Vocarescar is a live snail processing plant. We buy live snail and process it into a finished product (frozen meat). We store and process washed houses for consumption.
